mapper.sql: select max(v2.id) as max_key_code, min(v2.id) as min_key_code, count(1) as count from ( select v.id , rownum as rn from (

select distinct '2' as type, to_char(t.prp_code) as prp_code from proposal_extend t where 1 = 1 and t.compare_rule_familiar_cnt = '-1' and not exists (select 1 from prp_rule_check_result prcr where prcr.prp_code = t.prp_code and prcr.vallidate_type = 0 and prcr.is_restore = 0) union select '3' as type, to_char(t.prp_code) as prp_code from proposal_extend t where 1 = 1 and t.compare_prp_familiar_cnt = '-1' and not exists (select 1 from compare_result where status = 0) union select '3' as type , to_char(pe.prp_code) as prp_code from proposal_extend pe left join proposal p on pe.prp_code = p.prp_code where 1=1 and pe.compare_prp_familiar_cnt = 0 and exists (select 1 from prp_compare_result t where (t.prp_code1 = pe.prp_code or t.prp_code2 = pe.prp_code)) and p.prj_stat_year = (select app.value from application_setting app where app.key = 'stat_year') and not exists (select 1 from compare_result where status = 0) and nvl(pe.last_prp_cnt_sync_time,sysdate -1) < (sysdate - 10/60/24)
mapper.select: select t.id as result_id, t.source_id, t.target_id, t.data_type, s1.content as source_content, s2.content as target_content from compare_result t inner join compare_list s1 on s1.id = t.source_id inner join compare_list s2 on s2.id = t.target_id where 1 = 1 and t.status = '0' and t.id >= ${startKeyCode} and t.id <= ${endKeyCode}
